room.name: Entrance to the Plane of Nirvana
room.description:
You stand before the entrance to a plane of absolute balance and order.  It is
equally hot and cold, equally light and dark, and made of equal parts of solid
and liquid.
 
The plane extends to the west and east, while an exit lies downward.

doors.description: To the east, the plane extends for what seems to be forever.
To the west, the plane extends for what seems to be forever.
Downwards, you see the portal leading back to home.

room.name: The Plane of Nirvana
room.description:
You are traveling the Plane of Nirvana.  It has endless boundaries to the east
and west

doors.description: To the east, there seems to be a bend in direction of travel.
To the west, the plane seems to extend forever.

room.name: The Plane of Nirvana
room.description:
You are on a western strech of the plane.  Boundaries to the east and west seem 
nonexistent.

doors.description: The plane seems to strech forever to the east
The plane continues to the west where is appears to change direction

room.name: A Change in Direction
room.description:
Here, the plane seems to direct you to the north.  Also, the plane continues 
to the west.

doors.description: The plane continues to the north with no end in sight
The plane contiues to the west with no end in sight

room.name: A Change in Direction
room.description: Here, the plane goes to the north and bends to the east

doors.description: The vast plane seems to have no end to the north
To the east, the plane has no visible end

room.name: A North-South direction of the plane
room.description: The plane continues to the north and south

doors.description: To the north, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.
To the south, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.

room.name: A North-South stretch of the plane
room.description: The plane continues to the north and the south

doors.description: To the north, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.
To the south, the plane stretches as far as the eye can see.

room.name: In the Tower of Nirvana
room.description:
Entering the tower, there seems to be enough light to see by, but no source is 
visible.  The hall continues to the east, while a door lies to the west.

doors.description: The hall continues east into oblivion.
A great door lies to the west

room.name: A hallway in the Tower of Nirvana
room.description:
You are in a east-west hallway in the tower.  to the west, the hall continues 
and a door lies to the east.

doors.description: A great door lies to the east
the hallway continues west into oblivion.

room.name: An east-west hallway in the Tower of Nirvana
room.description: The hallway continues to the east, and stretches to the west.

doors.description: The hallway continues east into oblivion.
The Hallway continues west into oblivion.

room.name: An east-west passage in the Tower of Nirvana

doors.description: The Hallway contiues east into oblivion
The Hallway contiues west into oblivion

room.name: An intersection in the Tower of Nirvana
room.description:
You are at an intersection where the east-west passage continues, but a large 
passage leads to the north.

doors.description: The passage continues to the north where it seems to get wider.
The passage ontinues eastward into oblivion.
The passage continues westward into oblivion.

room.name: At the door to the Tower of Nirvana
room.description:
You stand on the plane where a mighty door lies to the west.
The plane also continues north and southward.  There is a large sign on the 
door.

doors.description: The plane continues northward as far as the eye can see.
The plane continues southward as far as the eye can see.
A mighty door lies to the west

extra_description.description:
The sign reads:
                     WARNING
Only those brave of heart and high of level should
enter the Tower of Nirvana.

room.name: At the door to the Tower of Nirvana
room.description:
The plane continue to the north and south, while a mighty door lies to the 
east.  There is a sign on the door.

doors.description: The plane stretches to the north as far as the eye can see.
A mighty door sits to the east
The plane continues to the south as far as the eye can see

extra_description.description:
The sign reads:
                  WARNING!
Only those brave of heart and high of level
should attempt to enter the Tower of Nirvana.

room.name: A north-south area of the Plane of Nirvana
room.description: The plane continues to the north and southward.

doors.description: The plane continues endlessly to the north.
The plane continues endlessly to the south.

room.name: A north-south area on the Plane of Nirvana
room.description: the plane continues to the north and south

doors.description: The plane continues endlessly to the north
The plane continues endlessly to the south

room.name: Dead End
room.description: You stand at a dead end where the only exit appears to be west.

doors.description: The passage continue to the west.

room.name: Dead End
room.description: You are at what appears to be a dead end.  The only exit is back east.

doors.description: The passage continues to the east.

room.name: A Tertain's lair
room.description:
You quite possibly have made a terrible mistake coming in here.
Exits lead east and west.

doors.description: The passage continues to the east
The passage leads west where you can see a bright light ahead.

room.name: A Tertian's lair
room.description:
You might have made a terrible mistake coming into here.
Exits lead east and west.

doors.description: The passage continues eastward where you can see a bright light.
The passage continues westward into oblivion.

room.name: The Lair of Primus
room.description:
You are in a large hall, with a massive pool of what appears to be pure energy 
in the center of the room.  Exits lead in all the cardinal directions.  From 
the pool rises the master of the Plane of Nirvana....

doors.description: A passage leads north into the unknown.
A passage leads east into the unknown.
A passage leads south into the unknown.
A passage leads west into the unknown.

room.name: A Tertian's lair
room.description:
Maybe coming here wasn't such a hot idea.  You feel very unwelcome here.  
Exits lead north and south

doors.description: The passage leads north where you can see a bright light.
The passage leads south into the unknown.

room.name: The office of a Quinton
room.description:
You have stumbled upon the office of a page to Primus.
Scrolls lie about the room along with many strange objects...you can't imagine 
what kind of creature would use them.  Exits lead in all the cardinal 
directions.

doors.description: The passage heads northward where you can see nothing.
The passage goes east where you feel it might be bad to go.
The passage goes south into oblivion.
The passage heads westward into oblivion.

room.name: A wide north-south passageway
room.description: you find yourself in a passage where the exits are north and south

doors.description: To the north, you spy an intersection of tunnels.
To the south you can barely make out a junction of passageways.

room.name: A Tertian's lair
room.description: You find yourself in a lair of a Tertian.  Exits lead north and south.

doors.description: To the north, you can make out a intersection of tunnels.
To the south, you can see a bright light.

room.name: A north south tunnel
room.description: You are in a passage where the only exits are north and south.

doors.description: Far to the north you can see a door.
To the south you stare into darkness.

room.name: An intersection of passages
room.description:
You stand at an intersection.  Exits lead off to the east and south. 
A door lies to the north

doors.description: you see a massive door
To the east, you spy a dark passage
To the south you stare into oblivion.

room.name: A change of direction
room.description: The plane curves from the south to west

doors.description: looking south, you see the plane extending beyond view.
looking west, you can't fathom how far the plane extends.

room.name: A change of direction
room.description: Here, the plane takes a turm from the south to heading east.

doors.description: The plane heads east from here. You can't see the end of it.
Looking south, you view the plane extending for miles.

room.name: An east-west route on the Plane of Nirvana
room.description: Exits lead east and west.

doors.description: looking east, you spy a door far off in the distance.
looking west, in the distance you can spy a curve south.

room.name: An east-west route on The Plane of Nirvana
room.description: Exits lead east and west

doors.description: looking east, you can see a bend in the distance.
glancing west, you can spy a door far off in the distance.

room.name: A large door in the passage
room.description: The passages goes east and west, with a large door to the south.

doors.description: looking east, you see more of the passage.
A large door blocks the way to the south.
looking west, you see more of the passage.

room.name: A Junction in the passage
room.description: Here, passages lead off in all cardinal directions.

doors.description: Looking north, you spy a small room in the distance
Eastward, the passage continues in the darkness.
South of here is a small room.
West, you spy an intersection.

room.name: The office of the Octon
room.description: you are in a small room, the only exit is south.

doors.description: looking south, you see an intersection.

room.name: A small room
room.description: The only exit is north

doors.description: Looking north, you spy an intersection.

room.name: A passageway
room.description: Exits lead in all cardinal directions.

doors.description: Looking north you spy a average sized room.
Looking east, you can make out a large room
Looking south, you can see an average room.
Looking west, you can see an intersection ahead.

room.name: Lair of a Hexton
room.description:
You are in a room that is in complete disrepair.  Items are thrown throughout 
the room making them worthless piles of junk.
The only exit is back south

doors.description: Looking south, you can make out a passage.

room.name: Office of a Hexton
room.description: A makeshift desk forms the center of this room.  The only exit is north.

doors.description: Looking north, you can make out a hallway.

room.name: Office of a Secundus
room.description:
You are standing in a office of one of the Viceroys of the Plane of Nirvana.  
The occupant doesn't look real thrilled with your presence.  The only exits is 
west.

doors.description: Looking west you can see a long hallway

room.name: A Junction in the hallway
room.description: Your are standing in a junction, exits lead in all the cardinal directions.

doors.description: To the north, you spy a small room
To the east, you see a quadruple junction
To the south you see a small room
To the west, the passageway continues

room.name: Office of an Octon
room.description:
You see a messy room with papers scattered everywhere.
The only exit leads back to the south

doors.description: To the south you can make out a junction.

room.name: Office of a Septon
room.description:
A neat and tidy room, it appear to be inhabited my a neatenss freak.  The only 
exit lies to the north.

doors.description: To the north you see a junction.

room.name: An east-west passage
room.description: In east west passage is here with exits in all of the cardinal directions.

doors.description: You can see a room to the north.
To the east you can see a junction
To the south you can make out a averaged sized room.
To the west you can see what appears to be a cavernous room.

room.name: The Barracks
room.description:
A dusty room, with a almost untolerable odor, the barracks are being inspected 
by a Hexton and his personal enterage.
The only exit lies to the south.

doors.description: To the south you can see junction

room.name: The Commander's Post
room.description:
You have stumbled on to the office of the Commander of the forces in the Plane 
Of Nirvana.  The room is well furnished and a sense of courage and bravery 
overtakes you as you enter the room.  The only exit lies to the north.

doors.description: To the north you can visualize a junction of passages.

room.name: The chamber of the second Secundus
room.description:
This huge room is furnished with the finest, and a personal legion guards the 
Secundus. the only exit is to the east.

doors.description: To the east you can see a junction

room.name: A Passageway
room.description:
You are in a well lit passage.  A sense of forboding danger envelopes you.  
Exits lead in all cardinal directions.

doors.description: To the north you can see a small chamber
To the east, the passage continues,.
To the south, a chamber can be seen
To the west, a large tunnel can be found.

room.name: Chamber of the Octon
room.description:
A small room, sparsely furnished, it leaves you with a sense of fear.  The 
only exit is to the south

doors.description: To the south you can see a passage.

room.name: Chamber of the Nonaton
room.description:
You have entered the chamber of the principal law and order overseers.  The 
only exit lies to the north

doors.description: To the north you can see a passageway.

room.name: End of the passageway
room.description:
You have reached the end of a long east-west passage.  The passage contiues to 
the west, and rooms lie to the north, south, and east.

doors.description: To the north you can see a room
To the east you can make out a large chamber
To the south, a room can be seen.
to the west, the passageway continues

room.name: Chamber of a Hexton
room.description:
You have entered the chamber of a Hexton.  Trophies adorn the walls, some of 
which are human. the only exit is to the south.

doors.description: To the south you can see a passageway.

room.name: Chamber of a Hexton
room.description:
You have entered a room where you are not very popular. The only exit lies 
northbound.

doors.description: To the north you can see a passage.

room.name: Chamber of the Secudus
room.description:
A large canvernous room, this chamber serves as the sleeping quarters for the 
third Secudus, Viceroy to Primus. The only exit lies to the west.

doors.description: To the west you can see a passageway.

room.name: A passageway
room.description: You are in a passagway where you may go in any cardinal direction.

doors.description: To the north lies a small chamber
To the east, a main passage forms a junction.
To the south, you can spot a small room
To the west, the passageway continues

room.name: A small chamber
room.description: You are in a small cramped chamber.  The only exit lies to the south.

doors.description: To the south you can see a passage

room.name: A cramped room
room.description: You are in a small, crowded room.  The only exit appears to lie to the north.

doors.description: To the north, you can see a passageway.

room.name: A large room
room.description:
You have entered a room where you are not wanted.  The only exit lies to the 
south.

doors.description: To the south you can visualize a east-west passage.

room.name: A room
room.description:
You have entered a room where there was obviously a hurried move going on.  
The only exit lies to the north.

doors.description: To the north you can make out a passageway.

room.name: Chamber of The First Secundus
room.description:
You have disturbed the rest of the First Viceroy to Primus the Prime, The 
Secundus.  He does not look like a happy camper. The only exit lies to the 
east.

doors.description: To the east you can spot a hallway

room.name: Junction in the hallway
room.description: Exits lead off in all of the cardinal directions

doors.description: To the north lies a large chamber
To the east , the passage continues.
To the south, a small chamber can be found.
To the west, lies a monstrous room.
